markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Twin Feint](/Feats.aspx?ID=4921) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 170 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Red Mantis Assassin](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=271) (Level 2)

**Requirements**
You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand

</column>

---

You use an attack with one weapon to distract your foe from a second attack coming at a different angle. Make one Strike with each of your two melee weapons, both against the same target. The target is automatically off-guard against the second attack. Apply your multiple attack penalty to the Strikes normally.

<title level="2">Twin Feint leads to...</title>
[Twin Distraction](/Feats.aspx?ID=4939)
name: Twin Feint
requirement: You are wielding two melee weapons, each in a different hand
